text: averages of a two dimensional list
Basically, the function should deliver the average of the lists within the list.

code:
def average(l):
    for i in range(len(l)):
        for j in range(len(l[0])):
            l[i] / l[j]
    return l

text: My coding shows up an error sign saying "TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for /: 'list' and 'list'".
I don't get what I'm doing wrong.
